wordageddon.dao

Interface GameSessionDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameSessionDAOSQLite

    public interface GameSessionDAO
    GameSessionDAO interface for managing game session data in the database. Provides basic CRUD operations for GameSession entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addGameSession(int userId, int score, java.lang.String difficulty, java.lang.String language)
      Adds a new game session to the database.
      int countGameSessions()
      Counts the total number of game sessions in the database.
      void deleteGameSession(int sessionId)
      Deletes a game session from the database.
      java.util.List<GameSession> getAllGameSessions()
      Retrieves all game sessions from the database.
      GameSession getGameSession(int sessionId)
      Retrieves a game session by its ID.
      java.util.List<GameSession> getGameSessionsByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all game sessions for a specific user.
      java.util.List<GameSessionSummary> getGameSessionSummariesByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves game session summaries for a specific user.
      java.util.List<UserLeaderboardEntry> getGlobalLeaderboard()
      Retrieves the global leaderboard showing all users with their total points.
      void updateSessionScore(int sessionId, int score)
      Updates the score of an existing game session.

    • Method Detail

      • addGameSession

        int addGameSession(int userId,
                   int score,
                   java.lang.String difficulty,
                   java.lang.String language)
        Adds a new game session to the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user playing
        score - the final score of the session
        difficulty - the difficulty level of the session
        language - the language used in the session
        Returns:
        the ID of the created session

      • getGameSession

        GameSession getGameSession(int sessionId)
        Retrieves a game session by its ID.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session
        Returns:
        the GameSession object if found, null otherwise

      • getGameSessionsByUser

        java.util.List<GameSession> getGameSessionsByUser(int userId)
        Retrieves all game sessions for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        a list of game sessions for the user

      • updateSessionScore

        void updateSessionScore(int sessionId,
                        int score)
        Updates the score of an existing game session.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session
        score - the new score

      • deleteGameSession

        void deleteGameSession(int sessionId)
        Deletes a game session from the database.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the ID of the session to delete

      • getAllGameSessions

        java.util.List<GameSession> getAllGameSessions()
        Retrieves all game sessions from the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all game sessions

      • countGameSessions

        int countGameSessions()
        Counts the total number of game sessions in the database.
        Returns:
        the total number of game sessions

      • getGameSessionSummariesByUser

        java.util.List<GameSessionSummary> getGameSessionSummariesByUser(int userId)
        Retrieves game session summaries for a specific user. This method returns lightweight summary objects instead of full GameSession objects.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        a list of game session summaries for the user

      • getGlobalLeaderboard

        java.util.List<UserLeaderboardEntry> getGlobalLeaderboard()
        Retrieves the global leaderboard showing all users with their total points. Users are ordered by total points in descending order.
        Returns:
        a list of user leaderboard entries ordered by total points
